Class XMLFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.File
      • fr.imt.ales.redoc.xml.spring.structure.XMLFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class XMLFile
extends java.io.File
    A class for representing XML Spring deployment descriptors

    Alexandre Le Borgne

      • isCyclic

        public java.lang.Boolean isCyclic()
                           throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        Checks whether the import chain is cyclic or not
        Returns:
        true if the current file has a cyclic import chain, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any I/O errors occur.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If any parse errors occur.

      • isCyclic

        private java.lang.Boolean isCyclic(java.util.List<XMLFile> imps)
                            throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Checks whether the import chain is cyclic or not
        Parameters:
        imps - the import List of XMLFiles
        Returns:
        true if at least one XMLFile in imps has a cyclic import chain, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any I/O errors occur.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If any parse errors occur.

      • isDescendentOf

        public java.lang.Boolean isDescendentOf(XMLFile file)
                                 throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                        java.io.IOException
        Checks within the import chain whether the current XMLFile is a descendant of another XMLFile or not
        Parameters:
        file - the XMLFile to check descendants from
        Returns:
        true if the current XMLFile is a descendant of file, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any I/O errors occur.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If any parse errors occur.

      • isDecendent

        public java.lang.Boolean isDecendent(XMLFile child,
                                     XMLFile parent)
                              throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Checks within the import chain whether a XMLFile is a descendant of another XMLFile or not
        Parameters:
        child - the potential descendant XMLFile
        parent - the XMLFile to check descendants from
        Returns:
        true if child is a descendant of parent, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any I/O errors occur.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - If any parse errors occur.

      • isSpring

        public java.lang.Boolean isSpring()
        Checks whether the current XMLFile is a Spring deployment descriptor or not
        Returns:
        true if the current XMLFile is a Spring deployment descriptor, false otherwise
